meanings.definition: The position or function of a chairperson.
meanings.sent1: Her chairmanship of the meeting ensured everyone had a chance to speak.
meanings.sent2: The board elected him to the chairmanship of the committee.
meanings.sent3: His chairmanship of the picnic planning committee led to a feast of fun and food.
meanings.sent4: In the game of musical chairs, her chairmanship was unmatched as she swiftly claimed each seat.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of chairmanship requires fairness and organization.

meanings.definition: The act or skill of being a chairperson.
meanings.sent1: His chairmanship was evident in how smoothly the meeting ran.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated excellent chairmanship by keeping the discussion focused.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed impressive chairmanship by claiming the comfiest chair in the house.
meanings.sent4: His chairmanship shone through as he expertly guided the team to success.
meanings.sent5: Effective chairmanship involves listening to all viewpoints before making a decision.
